Our Added Value

DB Europe provides expertise and support to major ‘Blue Chip’ organizations, often in challenging locations worldwide.

Transparency in Corporate Governance, Business Processes and Controls and excellence in the provision of Support Services to Operations and Project Management,

We are process oriented, structured and pragmatic.

DB Europe has an uncompromised approach to Health & Safety.

About Us

Bill Flint

Managing Partner

Operations, Projects and Business Management expert specialising in large scale operations in challenging environments worldwide. Managed major projects in Europe, Middle East, Africa and Far East. Clients include ExxonMobil, British Gas, National Employment Savings Trust, Aviva Corporation, BNP Paribas, Ericsson Telecom, AT&T and Lucent Technologies

Dorota Flint

Managing Partner

Widely experienced in all aspects of facility, property and asset portfolio management, ranging from A-class large multi-tenanted offices and business parks in developed countries to regional corporate headquarters, exclusive residential compounds, leisure and hospitality facilities in challenging locations worldwide (Africa, Far East, Asia Pacific), start-up to project handover, transition and change management. Contracts Management and Business Processes and Controls. Clients include ExxonMobil, Halliburton, AIG Lincoln and Pioneer Real Estate.
